personal.name: Ashutosh Dash
personal.title: Frontend Developer | React & Next.js
personal.bio: Frontend engineer building fast, scalable web apps with React, Next.js & TypeScript. Skilled in modern UI frameworks and passionate about crafting clean interfaces.

experience.description: Building high-quality dashboards and internal tools using Next.js, React, Mantine, and Refine. Responsible for UI development, performance optimization, analytics implementation, API integrations, and code quality improvements. Mentored interns and participated actively in code reviews.

Worked on a React Native mobile application with a strong focus on UI refactoring, performance tuning, and seamless user experience. Implemented analytics tracking and integrated backend APIs using Node.js while improving component reusability.

Developed a QR-based restaurant menu application, built a hotel check-in sub-system, and modernized the booking engine using modular, reusable components. Maintained the BookingJini Icons Pack open-source library.

projects.title: Get That API
projects.description: A free API testing browser extension to test your API with GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE methods.

projects.title: Nextjs Mantine Boilerplate
projects.description: A modern, production-ready boilerplate for building web applications with Next.js 16, React 19, and Mantine UI v8.

projects.title: LearningPad API Client Example
projects.description: An example repo for how to use the LearningPad API in a frontend application.

projects.title: GPT Lawyer
projects.description: An AI-powered legal assistant specializing exclusively in Indian laws, legal matters, and legal procedures. Get accurate information about Indian Acts, Statutes, Regulations, case law, and legal procedures through an intuitive chat interface.

projects.title: ICCCT 2023
projects.description: Official website for the ICCCT 2023 conference.

projects.title: Roshni Satpathy Portfolio
projects.description: Portfolio website for Roshni Satpathy as Designer.

freelance.title: Available for Freelance/Contract Projects
freelance.description: Open to collaborating on frontend development, UI engineering, React/Next.js applications, and performance-focused web builds. If you have a project in mind, feel free to reach out.

reviews.review: I had the pleasure of working with Ashutosh Dash as his client, and I was truly impressed with his expertise in Frontend Development, React, and JavaScript. He has a great eye for detail, communicates clearly, and always delivers high-quality work on time. Ashutosh not only understood the requirements quickly but also suggested valuable improvements, making the final outcome even better. His mix of technical skill and problem-solving ability makes him a reliable and talented UI/Frontend Developer I would highly recommend.

Ashutosh possesses a rare combination of technical expertise and creative problem-solving abilities that make him a standout developer. His proficiency in React, JavaScript, and UI development is truly commendable, and he consistently demonstrated a strong command over various front-end stacks. One of Ashutosh's standout qualities is his proactive involvement in open-source contributions. Not only did he actively contribute to open-source projects, but he also played a crucial role in fostering a culture of open-source engagement within our team at Bookingjini. His efforts not only enhanced his own skills but also benefited the broader developer community. Ashutosh's commitment to delivering high-quality solutions is unmatched. I wholeheartedly recommend him for any front-end role, and I'm confident he will excel in his new position.

I highly recommend my former college junior Ashutosh. I had the pleasure of working closely with him on numerous projects during our time together in college. Not only did we collaborate effectively as colleagues, but I also had the opportunity to be a client for one of our projects, where he played a crucial role in developing my portfolio. Ashutosh possesses exceptional web development skills, consistently delivering high-quality work on all our projects. His proficiency in frontend technologies is impressive and his ability to turn ideas into functional and aesthetically pleasing web applications is commendable. Moreover, his soft skills are equally impressive. He is an excellent communicator, a dependable team player, and has a strong work ethic. His dedication to meeting deadlines and his willingness to go the extra mile to ensure client satisfaction make him an asset to any team. I have no doubt that he will continue to excel in his role and contribute significantly to the success of the company. He is not only a talented developer but also a person of integrity and professionalism. I wholeheartedly endorse him and believe he will be a valuable addition to any organization fortunate enough to have him on board.

infoPanels.title: What kind of roles are you looking for?
infoPanels.content: I am seeking frontend-focused roles where I can work with React, Next.js, and modern UI frameworks. I enjoy building clean, scalable interfaces and would be a strong fit for teams that value quality engineering, thoughtful design, and ownership.

infoPanels.title: How do you approach problem-solving?
infoPanels.content: I break down problems into smaller components, analyze edge cases, and evaluate trade-offs before committing to a solution. I value clarity, maintainability, and predictable outcomes. I also rely heavily on data—profiling tools, performance metrics, and user insights—to guide optimizations.

infoPanels.title: What strengths do you bring to a development team?
infoPanels.content: My strengths include strong UI/UX intuition, deep understanding of React and component architecture, clean code practices, and an ability to communicate clearly with designers, PMs, and backend engineers. I’m proactive, detail-oriented, and comfortable owning end-to-end delivery.

infoPanels.title: How do you ensure code quality and maintainability?
infoPanels.content: I rely on consistent coding standards, reusable components, proper file structures, and strict type-safety when possible. I write clear documentation, perform thorough code reviews, and optimize for readability without compromising performance.
